questions.question: Which method of learning does an AI system use when it uses the process of trial and error?
You train Google Photos to identify people in photographs. As a result, Google Photos can recognize their faces. What kind of learning is this?
YouTube and Netflix often recommend options to users. What kind of learning is used to generate these recommendations?
Fill in the blank. All supervised learning algorithms need __________ data.
Fill in the blank. __________ learning occurs when the algorithm is given unlabeled data.
